text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulas imon ovardaed, agar ʙo jakdigar nacvo (roz, suxani maxfi) mekuned, dar ʙoʙi gunohu dusmani va nofarmoni az pajomʙar nacvo (suxan ʙad) magued, ʙalki dar ʙoʙi nekivu parhezgori nacvo kuned. Va az Alloh ʙitarsed ʙo ʙa coj ovardani amrhojas va ʙa parhez kardan az man' kardahojas, pas hamagon (ʙa amalho va suxanhojaton) ʙa sui U ʙozmegarded va zud ast, ki muvofiqi on sumoro cazo medihad
